name: prevent_model_collapse
description: Preemptive safeguard against model collapse, ensuring consistent learning and retention of data integrity across model generations.

initial_data.description: The initial clean data used for training the first model (model 0).

text.description: Text data sample that will be used for training.

label.description: Label associated with the data sample.

training_steps.description: Number of iterations for training the models to evaluate convergence and performance.

max_samples.description: Maximum number of samples to retain for each model's training dataset.

memory_limit.description: Memory limit for training each individual model.

sampling_method.description: Method used for data sampling during each training phase.
